title: Repository inventory generation
rationale: Complete analysis of current state for cleanup planning

title: Duplicate detection analysis
rationale: Identify 144 duplicate groups for 812MB space savings

title: File classification and disposition
rationale: Automated processing decision for all 1498 files
impact: Smart categorization: keep(39), consolidate(1194), delete(89), etc

title: Security scan for secrets
rationale: Immediate removal of 1 detected secret file (.env)

title: Create archive directory structure
rationale: Safe staging area for 20 archived files before permanent decisions
impact: Risk mitigation for reversible cleanup operations

title: Create output directory structure
rationale: Proper location for 118 regeneratable files
impact: Future generation organization, Git tracking exclusion

title: Migrate scattered log files
rationale: Move 7 log files to unified _logs structure

title: Archive non-critical reports
rationale: Move 20 report/generated files to _archive for safe keeping
impact: Immediate clutter reduction while preserving content

title: Consolidate exact duplicates
rationale: Remove 15 groups of exact duplicates (SHA256 verified)

title: Convert heavy notebooks to Python
rationale: Extract logic from 5+ heavy notebooks (>1MB) to .py files
impact: Better version control, reduced repository bloat

title: Setup Git LFS for large files
rationale: Move 3 files >50MB to Git LFS for repository performance
impact: Faster git operations, proper large file handling

title: Relocate misplaced Python files
rationale: Move 35 files to proper directories (scripts->src, docs reorganization)

title: Remove regeneratable output files
rationale: Delete 118 regeneratable files, document recreation in docs/operations/runbooks.md
impact: Major space reduction, force fresh generation

title: Consolidate notebook variants
rationale: Merge 129 groups of similar notebooks, keeping canonical versions

title: Delete confirmed waste files
rationale: Remove 89 files identified as low-value (score <0.2)
impact: Final cleanup of temporary, broken, and obsolete content

title: Update .gitignore patterns
rationale: Prevent future contamination with enhanced exclusion rules

title: Setup pre-commit hygiene hooks
rationale: Automated prevention of large files, secrets, generated content

title: Create MIGRATION.md documentation
rationale: Document old->new path mappings for team coordination

title: Create DEPRECATIONS.md warnings
rationale: Communicate deprecated paths with sunset timelines
impact: User guidance for adapting to new structure

title: Generate final hygiene report
rationale: Comprehensive before/after analysis and success metrics
